title: CWC Art Contest
html_content:
The CWC Art Contest is a series of YouTube videos in which Chris reviews fanart he had requested on Twitter.[1]

Contents

  • 1 Round 1
    • 1.1 Description
    • 1.2 Transcript
    • 1.3 Raw captions
    • 1.4 Doxxing
      • 1.4.1 Warning Emails
        • 1.4.1.1 Email 1
        • 1.4.1.2 Email 2
      • 1.4.2 Gallery
  • 2 Round 1 (reupload)
  • 3 Semifinals
    • 3.1 Description
    • 3.2 Raw captions
  • 4 Art Contest Top 5
    • 4.1 Description
    • 4.2 Transcript
  • 5 Email
    • 5.1 Email Transcript
  • 6 References

Round 1

A censored example of an email message Chris revealed.

CWC ART CONEST Round 1 is a video uploaded to Chris's YouTube channel on 13 February 2024 which involved Chris screen-recording his gmail screen while opening fanart pictures. Chris carelessly revealed email messages - which includes information such as names and email addresses - while looking through the pictures. One of the artworks has Caden's dox superimposed on it.

A censored screenshot of Caden's info superimposed on fanart.

The video was taken down a few days after uploading "due to a privacy claim by a third party". The original video is mirrored via GhostArchive[2] and catbox.moe.[3]

CWC ART CONEST Round 1

Stardate 13 February 2024
Subject Matter Comics Comics, Fan Art Fan Art
Saga Revelations Revelations, Praetor Praetor

OFFICIAL and HONEST CWC Videos

Christ Chan Return Live Stream Highlights 		next
Chris Chan Highlight Stream 2

Description

#CartoonNetwork #Nickelodeon #DiscoveryFamily

The review of some of the submissions so far; I thank all of you for your submissions so far, and I look forward to the others that follow.

Submissions can be sent to: cwcartcontest@gmail.com, and the deadline is February 24, 2024, 6:00 PM EST.

Visit the Etsy Store for often updated items we have for sale as well.
[Link to OfficialCWCmart]

*Special Callout to ALL Good, Soulful, and Compassionate Artists and Writers*

I am personally hosting a contest looking for the best to help out.

All Inquiries are to be sent to cwcartcontest@gmail.com.

And we have Strict Boundaries.

You will be immediately disqualified if you submit anything NSFW, sex-heavy, filled with gore and blood, curse words or swearing, satanic, demonic or devilish promotion or icons, and if it contains a lack of heart, care or soul. Trolling, Bullying and Deceptive ones will also be disqualified.

All submissions are inclusive to Art and Written/Typed Stories and Fan-Fictions. Submissions may be up to TV-14 in content rating, but the final products will be around TV-Y7 or TV-PG. *Rule of Thumb: If it can‚Äôt air on #CartoonNetwork, #Nickelodeon or even #DiscoveryFamily, it will not do.

Of course, plagiarism or using artificial intelligence in submissions will not be allowed.

I will personally be screening your art portfolios online when applicable for consistency in content, including on DeviantArt, Twitter, Instagram, etcetera.

And this goes out to Everyone in the #SonicTheHedgehog, #Pokemon, #MyLittlePony (Generation Four and Prior), #Transformers, #MachineRobo/#GoBots, #HyperdimensionNeptunia, and even #Marvel, #DC, #Disney and other mainline fandoms. Furries, Spiritual-Heavy, and LGBTQIA+ are also invited and encouraged.

Submissions will be due by February 24, 2024.

Those selected will get a Sonichu Medallion and a set of the new printed books autographed for free. Submissions we like may be posted with consent from the artist and author.

Thank you all for your consideration. I look forward to seeing your works, personally. ‚ö°Ô∏èüíô‚ö°Ô∏è


Transcript

Transcript
Chris: Hey everybody, Hay-zeus CHRISTine Weston Chandler Sonichu Prime here... and today we're gonna be to be beginning the- looking at some looking the Arts we have so far for our lovely little art contest

which a reminder of uh those that uh... we do select will receive Medallion and some and some of the autographed books.

But right now we're uh taking a look at what we have received so far and uh we're picking some to go into what we will be calling the semifinals... all right.

And then of course we'll do another... another one where uh then they go into the finals later on another video- [Video cuts due to editing]

[Fan art on screen via Google Drive]

We're taking a look at this one first and foremost... I like the art style of this one but obviously... uh the... when we talk- when we go into further details... about later on for- should should this one

make it to the finals but I do like the art style this one has... very very nice-

[Editing cut to a Furry picture of Chris]

Okay now the lovely lady here has presented quite the lovely art style... within her lovely furry correction and I do appreciate the furries and the Furry communities and everybody else as I've

mentioned before... but still this is a really nice art style I like the shading and the rendering... it's not bad I like it

[Edititing cut to a drawn peach with wings]

[Trademark Hmm] Okay so I took a look at these pieces from this particular artist uh... little bit grotesque and out of the way and now obviously we have a flying Peach so go ahead and make your joke references

right now yada yada yada [Blows raspberry] anyway... lovely she did- this one did a lovely bunch of of good styling in her art just very just appreciative and grateful of that...

just kind of an honorable mention at this point.... until further consideration.

[Editing cut to Chris showing a fully uncensored email from a contestant]

[Chris opens a basic fanart of Sonichu]

Alright, simple fan art like this... I mean the art style is there... but obviously... level room for improvement but it is being considered so this is anice little lovely simple art style.

Very... very good.

[Editing cut to a handmade statue of Sonichu]

All right yes this is a lovely... a lovely lovely.... piece of artwork. Though I will mention this Sonichu- Sonichu Prime does not have ch- chromia. I mean his- both his eyes are green.

So it's like I don't know what you were thinking with this one but still this is a lovely artwork I appreciate it... [Sighs and mhms]

I mean really good- really good use of clay and paint.

[Editing cut to a fanart of Rosechu]

Now this individual has a lovely Rosechu OC and the art style is very good- it's actually on par I feel like... I love the 80s aesthetic that this individual put with the background very,

very nice. May give this one a star actually... may!.. Come back to that later.

[Editing cut to a Sonic the hedgehog fanart]

MMk. Okay this individual has a really good art sty- okay has [Mumbles unintelligibly] so Matt's here... did a good job. really good job I love the art style in this.

[Editing cut to Pokemon fan art]

Yeah this is nice... hm... but let's not just um obviously... face exaggeration's decent to an extent... but I mean caricatures.... although caricatures are may just um hit or miss.

[Editing cut to comic of Chris' Pepper Spray incident]

Umm... [Blows raspberry] okay yeah nice little... one... nice... one portrayal... but I mean... I mean come on... [Puts glasses on his face] the lenses are clear... don't make them

dark for one thing... and obviously I'm not fat... [Quietly chuckles] [Yeesh, meh'] I like this guy that got the... guy here reminds me of- looks he looks like snively from Saturday

morning Sonic.

[Editing cut to Pokemon Emerald fan art]

Okay that's actually cute I like that.

[Editing cut to the Sonich art from the thumbnail]

This is very good, like... [With gusto:] Dynamic action sequences... yeah! [Laughs] yeah [Laughs again] It's still- that's a good art style... like the bright strokes and

everything [Trademark hm] very very goo-

[Editing cut to Fanta backed, genderbent, Chris Chan Sonichu]]

We don't do Fanta... anymore so... can we stop with that... [Circles his mouse cursor on the Fanta] stupid meme for one thing but other than that, just focusing on the piece... this

is nice, fluffy... textured, I like it. It's decent.

[Editing cuts to AI art of Sonichu]

[Chris is audibly and visually nervous]

Ok, well I mean... obviously... [Laughs at a very buff Sonichu] like I mean shoot... wasn't just chili dogs... but obviously yeah... this is... AI art but...

we're not looking for AI art... but I do like I mean this is nice... I like it.

[Editing cuts to art of Son-chu]

Ahh... hm... okay I really like this one just... [Imitating macho voice:] ya wanna mess with cwcville... [Punches hand] you're not getting very far... I like that.

I mean especially you got... nice [Unintelligble] Sonichu here and Magichan... and Son-chu there... very cool very nice I like this... [Hmm] you know what this one...

Definitely going to the semi-finals... this one. Hmm... is it not a star worthy... [In a childish voice:] is it star worthy? I'll consider it.

[Editing cut to Sonichu and gang art]

[Chris has a huge shit-eating grin]

Okay yes... I REALLY like this one. Although why is Punchie looking so angry at Bubbles? [In a high pitched tone:] What did she do? No... B-Bu-Bunchai, you're not angry

at bubbles... what's wrong with you? but still I love this one... this is very nice.

[Editing cut to Bubbles bikini fan art]

Yeah her fur does not turn from... Blue to White when reflected the sunlight but I appreciate the shading that was put into this piece... this uh...

that's a good theme going... even though... um... okay bubbles does surf... but she moreover likes to swim in the- in the oceans and she's a- she can swim REALLY

really fast.


[Editing cut to nightmare-fuel Chris fan art]

okay yes I definitely see it... okay this... High marks. Andron, I can tell... and very lovely colors and vibrant. Why do I look so old? [Scoffs]

That's okay this is still very good... I like this... semi.

[Editing cut to art of Sonichu Voring Chris]

Okay the art style is good on this one... and just... [Sighs]

Okay yeah just... why? Why? Why did you put a Sonichu that's dressed up like me... in there?

I know- I can tell that's not me, that's just someone else... unless you think that's Asperchu [Laughs at own joke]

But yeah... no. Uh... I like the art style is good- just... meh... [Laughs oddly] Um.. [In a nasally voice:] maybe we'll talk, we'll see. The shoes... meh

[Editing cut to Magichan eating pizza]

This is cute... THIS is cute I like this... obviously these are... a couple of OC's

[Editing cut to bizarre art of Chris]

Um... [Singing:] we all live in a yellow submarine... yellow submarine... yellow submarine. I'd really do appreciate that this is hand painted.

This is- this is pretty good actually just... it's cute. I like it- it's Avant-garde.

[Editing cuts to Jesus-like Sonichu art]

Oh... okay... [Aproving mmhmm's]]

Oh... OH? Ahhh... ah yes I like that. This... very nice. Very very nice I like this. Love went into this, I can tell.

[Editing cut to basic Sonichu Art]

[Chris gushes]

Oh YESSS YESS YES yes YES YES yes

[Editing cuts to MLP art]

oh my gosh... YES yesss yesss yesss

[Editing cuts to more pony art]

And I love a little dj [Unintelligbe] [Imitating some voice:] because you know I'm all about that bass, get it Bass

[Editing cuts to art of Chris]

Well it's supposed to be shin-guards not sucks but yeah... wow...

yes

yes


[Editing cuts to Chaotic combo art]

yes

YESS... I mean close aside this... the art style is... beautiful. Okay I like this... Po, good on yo.

[Editing cuts to more Chris art]

I like the tarot cards- I've seen a few already... but this one's nice... but then just- what's wrong with the Sonichu's eyes? They should not differ from-

they should not... be... like that... what is up with that, wink. Why?

[Editing cuts to more chaotic combo art]

[The art reads, "Happy birhtday[sic] C.W.C.!!"]

Alright, well this is a good mark to end on so yeah... keep on submitting... the deadline is... February 24th that's the last day we'll accept submissions and then we'll... do the F- do

the video of the fin- of the uh finals. Of our selecting our final ones they'll be going out- next video will be the semifinals, so... look forward to that.

And I'm looking forward to the continued submissions... I'll put a link in the, uh, description down below... so check that out as well.

Be geek, be proud... and I'm going to do this...

[Chris covers the camera with his palm]

[In a strange voice:] Palm in your faaaaace. [Laughs] Yay.

[Removes palm from camera]

[Editing cuts to pre-made Etsy ad]

[Video ends at 09:47]

Doxxing

A redditor warns contestants via email that they have been doxxed.

During the video, while looking through the submissions, Chris revealed private information about some contestants, such as their names and email addresses.

Users of the subreddit r/ChrisChanSonichu commented[4] upon this, saying:

smoodoos1
Chris said he wouldn't dox anyone; however, in his video, he proceeded to not censor several email addresses.
Tigs1112
I bet the weens are going to spam those uncensored emails.
TsukasaElkKite
I politely emailed them letting them know Chris doxxed them and that they should report the video.

Warning Emails

The Reddit user TsukasaElkKite emailed at least two of the doxxed individuals, warning them and encouraging them to report the video for privacy violation. It is unclear if these warnings are what led to the taking down of the video. However, the video was unavailable until the 20th of March 2024 and listed the reason as "This video is no longer available due to a privacy claim by a third party"[5].

Email 1

14 February 2023

Hi [REDACTED] I know you don't know me but I'm emailing you to let you know that Chris doxxed you in his latest video by showing your full name and email address at timestamp 1:40. I'd highly suggest you report the video for privacy violation.

Sent from my iPhone

Email 2

14 February 2023

Hi [REDACTED] I know you don't know me but I'm emailing you to let you know that Chris doxxed you in his latest Youtube video by showing your full name and email address at timestamp 4:09. I'd highly suggest you report the video for privacy violation.

Sent from my iPhone

Gallery

Gallery

Round 1 (reupload)

The video was reuploaded on 20 February, with the artwork featuring Caden's dox removed and "contest" spelled correctly. All other artists' personal information still remain in the video.

Semifinals

ART CONTEST Semifinals is a video uploaded to Chris's YouTube channel on 22 February 2024. Unlike CWC ART CONTEST Round 1 Chris does not show the emails of the participants.

Description

#CartoonNetwork #Nickelodeon #DiscoveryFamily

The semifinal review of some of the submissions so far; I thank all of you for your submissions so far, and I look forward to the others that follow.

Submissions can be sent to: cwcartcontest@gmail.com, and the deadline is February 24, 2024, 6:00 PM EST.

Visit the Etsy Store for often updated items we have for sale as well.
[Link to OfficialCWCmart]

Special Callout to ALL Good, Soulful, and Compassionate Artists and Writers

I am personally hosting a contest looking for the best to help out.

All Inquiries are to be sent to cwcartcontest@gmail.com.

And we have Strict Boundaries.

You will be immediately disqualified if you submit anything NSFW, sex-heavy, filled with gore and blood, curse words or swearing, satanic, demonic or devilish promotion or icons, and if it contains a lack of heart, care or soul. Trolling, Bullying and Deceptive ones will also be disqualified.

All submissions are inclusive to Art and Written/Typed Stories and Fan-Fictions. Submissions may be up to TV-14 in content rating, but the final products will be around TV-Y7 or TV-PG. *Rule of Thumb: If it can‚Äôt air on #CartoonNetwork, #Nickelodeon or even #DiscoveryFamily, it will not do.

Of course, plagiarism or using artificial intelligence in submissions will not be allowed.

I will personally be screening your art portfolios online when applicable for consistency in content, including on DeviantArt, Twitter, Instagram, etcetera.

And this goes out to Everyone in the #SonicTheHedgehog, #Pokemon, #MyLittlePony (Generation Four and Prior), #Transformers, #MachineRobo/#GoBots, #HyperdimensionNeptunia, and even #Marvel, #DC, #Disney and other mainline fandoms. Furries, Spiritual-Heavy, and LGBTQIA+ are also invited and encouraged.

Submissions will be due by February 24, 2024.

Those selected will get a Sonichu Medallion and a set of the new printed books autographed for free. Submissions we like may be posted with consent from the artist and author.

Thank you all for your consideration. I look forward to seeing your works, personally. ‚ö°Ô∏èüíô‚ö°Ô∏è

Art Contest Top 5

Art Contest Top 5 was uploaded on 25 February 2024, and has Chris announcing the five finalists and the winner of his contest, plus a couple of honorable mentions.

The winner of the contest received a personal blessing.

Description

Here are the Top 5 out of Ten Winners of the Art Contest. I thank everyone for their submissions and support. Everyone will be notified via email, so if you have submitted, check your emails.

*No more submissions are accepted at this time; the contest is over.*

Visit the Etsy Store for often updated items we have for sale as well.
[Link to OfficialCWCmart]

Email

On 27 February 2024 a Reddit user received an email from Chris asking them to congratulating them for reaching the top 20 of the contest and asking them if they would like to collab on future projects [6]

Email Transcript

Congratulations on making the Top Twenty of the Art Contest.

But also, I would like to ask you if you'd like to collab with me on future projects, including future books. If so, please do let me know. I have an initial assignment for you if you are interested. And you shall be credited in the final drafts of the projects.
In any event, I do humbly thank you for your kindness and support. I look forward to hearing back from you as soon as possible.
Sincerely,
Mrs. Jesus Christine Weston Chandler Sonichu Prime.
